mapper.select: SELECT A.*, B.userNick, B.profileImg, ifnull(C.likeNum,0) AS likeNum, D.coverImg FROM travelLog A JOIN user B ON B.userNum = A.userNum LEFT JOIN (SELECT tNum, COUNT(userNum) AS likeNum FROM likeClicker GROUP BY tNum) C ON C.tNum=A.tNum JOIN (SELECT tNum, tImg AS coverImg FROM travelDetail WHERE isCoverImg=1) D ON D.tNum=A.tNum WHERE isPrivate=0 ORDER BY likeNum DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT A.*, B.userNick, B.profileImg, ifnull(C.likeNum,0) AS likeNum, D.coverImg FROM travelLog A JOIN user B ON B.userNum = A.userNum LEFT JOIN (SELECT tNum, COUNT(userNum) AS likeNum FROM likeClicker GROUP BY tNum) C ON C.tNum=A.tNum JOIN (SELECT tNum, tImg AS coverImg FROM travelDetail WHERE isCoverImg=1) D ON D.tNum=A.tNum JOIN followUser E ON E.followingNum=A.userNum WHERE E.userNum=#{param1} AND isPrivate=0 ORDER BY tNum DESC LIMIT 10
